column3: Everything is {{c1::so}} expensive these days, isn't it?
He always looks good. He wears {{c1::such}} nice clothes.
I couldn't believe the news. It was {{c1::such a}} shock.
You work {{c1::so}} hard. Why do you do it?
The party was great. It was {{c1::such a}} shame you couldn't come.
Everything went wrong. We had {{c1::such}} bad luck.
What a nice garden! These are {{c1::such}} lovely flowers.
It's {{c1::so}} cold today. There's a really cold wind.
You should walk to the top of the hill. It's {{c1::such a}} lovely view from there.
